players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Vote for her."
Bob: "I trust Diana's investigation. Alice is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, you trust me, so vote Alice. Her motive is obvious: she killed Charlie. No other villager did it. Vote her now."
Bob: "I agree with Diana, Alice is mafia and killed Charlie. Vote her."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was protecting Bob. He is the real mafia. Vote Bob."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Vote for her."
Alice: "..."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Alice is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, you trust me, so vote Alice. Her motive is obvious: she killed Charlie. No other villager did it. Vote her now."
You: "I agree with Diana, Alice is mafia and killed Charlie. Vote her."
Alice: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was protecting Bob. He is the real mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
